long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides Georgia Region current weather, and temperatures for the next three days, extension functionality also have save your favorite country and after new open window you can see this reigon weather without changes

* no advertismenet
* no bugs
* save function
* work all version of chrome
